description: Astronomers using LIGO-Virgo-KAGRA detected 128 collisions of black holes and neutron stars, including two rare mixed mergers that double previous records. These findings reveal new details of stellar evolution, refine Hubble constant estimates, and test Einstein’s relativity in extreme conditions. The cosmic “graveyard” offers fresh insight into how stars die and black holes grow.
title: Astronomers Discover Stellar Graveyard Filled With Black Hole and Neutron Star Collisions

description: Scientists at the University of Tokyo have visualized gold nanoclusters in their earliest growth stage and discovered new elongated structures called gold quantum needles. These exhibit remarkable quantum properties, opening possibilities for sharper biomedical imaging and more efficient light-energy conversion in future applications.
title: Scientists Visualize New Gold Quantum Needles at Nanoscale

description: NASA has named Amit Kshatriya as its new Associate Administrator, a role overseeing agency operations and strategy. A 20-year NASA veteran, Kshatriya has led Artemis Moon-to-Mars missions and brings engineering, leadership, and spaceflight expertise. His appointment signals NASA’s renewed focus on Artemis and a bold vision for lunar exploration and future Mars missions.
title: Who Is Amit Kshatriya: Indian-Origin Appointed as NASA’s Associate Administrator

description: September promises to be one of the busiest months of the year in terms of game releases. The month kicks off early with Hollow Knight: Silksong and Hell is Us releasing on September 4. Later in the month, major titles like Borderlands 5 and Silent Hill f will launch on PC and consoles.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong, Borderlands 4, EA Sports FC 26: These Are the Biggest Games of September

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has spotted a bizarre planet-forming disk dominated by carbon dioxide where water is almost absent. This rare finding, in star system XUE 10 within NGC 6357, challenges current models of planetary formation and may reshape our understanding of habitable worlds.
title: James Webb Spots Bizarre Planet-Forming Disk Full of Carbon Dioxide

description: In Sept. 2025, NASA and NOAA will launch three spacecraft aboard a Falcon 9 to the Sun–Earth L1 point. IMAP will map the heliosphere’s edge, the Carruthers Geocorona Observatory will study Earth’s exosphere, and SWFO-L1 will deliver real-time solar storm warnings. Together, they aim to improve space-weather science and safeguard technology on Earth.
title: NASA and NOAA Set to Launch Solar Probes for Space Weather Forecasting

description: Qualcomm and BMW Group on Friday announced a new assisted driving system, the Snapdragon Ride Pilot, debuting on the recently launched BMW iX3 SUV. As part of the collaboration, Qualcomm designed the Snapdragon Ride SoC, while both companies jointly developed the Snapdragon Ride AD software stack.
title: Qualcomm Partners BMW to Bring New Automated Driving System to BMW iX3 SUV

description: Aankhon Ki Gustaakhiyan is a lighthearted romance drama movie that stars Vikrant Massey and Shanaya Kapoor in the lead roles. It is now available for streaming on ZEE5.  Its cast includes Vikrant Massey, Shanaya Kapoor, Rehmat Rattan, Zain Khan Durrani, Vikram Kocchar, and more.
title: Aankhon Ki Gustaakhiyan Now Streaming on ZEE5: Know Everything You Need to Know About this Vikrant Massey Starrer

description: Facebook is making it easier to use the Poke feature. The quirky tool, which used to be a sensation in the 2010s, had lost popularity among users towards the end of the last decade. However, in 2025, the Meta-owned platform is planning to bring it back by adding a dedicated Poke button to users’ profile screens.
title: Facebook Is Trying to Bring Back Pokes Playing on the 2010s Nostalgia

description: Google Nest Cam Outdoor (Wired, Second Gen) and Nest Cam Indoor (Wired, Third Gen), along with Nest Doorbell (Wired, Third Gen), reportedly spotted on the Google Home app. This hints that the California-based tech giant could be preparing to launch its three new smart home devices soon. The three devices could reportedly offer 2K video recording capabilities, along with up to 6x digital zoom.
title: Google Reportedly Lists New Outdoor and Indoor Nest Cam Models Alongside Nest Doorbell in Google Home App

description: Lenovo Legion Pro 7 (2025) was unveiled during the IFA 2025 event on Friday. The new gaming laptop is powered by up to an AMD Ryzen 9 HX processor, coupled with up to an Nvidia GeForce RTX 5080 GPU. It packs up to a 99.9Wh battery with Super Rapid Charge support. The company also showcased a concept laptop with a rotating screen, which can be used either horizontally or vertically.
title: IFA 2025: Lenovo Legion Pro 7 (2025) With Nvidia RTX 5080 GPU Unveiled Alongside ThinkBook VertiFlex Concept

description: Inspector Zende is a Netflix original movie that has landed on your digital screens. The movie stars Manoj Bajpayee and Jim Sarbh in the lead roles. The film will revolve around the manhunt of Carl Bhojraj (Played by Jim Sarbh), who escaped the Delhi prison post, throwing a party and drugging his guards. Here's all you need to know.
title: Inspector Zende Now Streaming On Netflix: All You Need To Know About This Manoj Bajpayee-Starring Cop Thriller

description: NFTs recorded $578 million in trading volumes and 5.5 million sales in August, their strongest run since February. The sector’s market cap rose to $9.3 billion with a 40 percent monthly jump. Analysts credit adoption, innovations, and renewed global interest for the turnaround.
title: NFT Trading Rose to New High in August Even as Sales Dipped: Report

description: Nothing has begun teasing the launch of the Ear 3, sharing images on X that hint at the earbuds’ design. In a community post, the company said user feedback pushed them to return to the simple numerical naming used for Ear 1 and Ear 2. A recent teaser with the caption “Materially different” suggests a possible shift from the polycarbonate build of the Ear 2. Reports indicate the Ear 3 will debut with significant upgrades over its predecessor.
title: Nothing Ear 3 Teaser Drops Ahead of Imminent Launch

description: ZTE Nubia Air is the company’s newest smartphone, introduced at IFA 2025 on Friday. It sports an ultra-slim form factor, coming in at 5.9mm and tipping the scales at 172g. The handset has a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It is powered by a Unisoc T8300 processor and comes with 256GB of internal storage. ZTE has equipped the Nubia Air with IP68 + IP69 + IP69K ratings for dust and water resistance.
title: Nubia Air Launched at IFA 2025 With Sleek 5.9mm Profile and 5,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung has opened pre-orders for the Galaxy Tab S11 series in India, starting at Rs. 74,999. The Galaxy Tab S11 Wi-Fi model is priced from Rs. 80,999 to Rs. 96,999, while its 5G variant costs Rs. 93,999 to Rs. 98,999. The Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra Wi-Fi version is priced at Rs. 1,10,999 and Rs. 1,21,999, with the 5G models at Rs. 1,24,999 and Rs. 1,35,999. Pre-orders include a free 45W adapter, with EMI options also available.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11, Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra Price in India Announced; Pre-Orders Open Ahead of Sale

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is set to commence in September-end. The sale event coincides with Flipkart’s Big Billion Days Sale 2025, which is confirmed to begin on the same day. During the sale, the US-based e-commerce giant will offer electronics, like smartphones, true wireless stereos (TWS), laptops, tablets, washing machines, refrigerators, and smart TVs at a relatively low price.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Deals on Laptops, Tablets, and More Teased

description: Lenovo unveiled an expanded lineup of AI PCs at IFA 2025 in Berlin on Friday. The new laptops are aimed at enhancing business productivity and accelerating AI solutions. Its latest lineup includes ThinkPad P1 Gen 8, ThinkPad P16v Gen 3, ThinkPad P16s i Gen 4, and ThinkPad P14s i Gen 6 models, powered by up to Intel Core Ultra Processor Series 2. The company also introduced a white colourway of the ThinkPad X9 Aura Edition.
title: IFA 2025: Lenovo ThinkPad P1 Gen 8 and ThinkPad P16v Gen 3 Laptops Announced Alongside Other ThinkPad P-Series Models

description: Lenovo launched the second-generation Legion Go gaming handheld on Friday at the IFA Berlin tech trade show. The Lenovo Legion Go 2 is powered by the AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme chipset paired with up to 32GB of RAM and 2TB of SSD storage. The Windows-based handheld features 8.8-inch display.
title: Lenovo Legion Go 2 With AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme Chip, 8.8-Inch OLED Display Debuts at IFA Berlin 2025

description: Motorola unveiled the Edge 60 Neo, Moto G06, and Moto G06 Power at IFA 2025. The Edge 60 Neo features a 6.36-inch 1.5K pOLED LTPO display, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chip, 50-megapixel Sony LYTIA 700C primary rear sensor, 5,200mAh battery with 68W fast charging, and MIL-STD-810H durability. The Moto G06 series offers a 6.88-inch LCD screen, MediaTek Helio G81-Extreme chip, 50-megapixel main camera, and large batteries, including a 7,000mAh cell in the Power model, along with Dolby Atmos speakers.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Neo Launched Alongside Moto G06, Moto G06 Power at IFA 2025

description: Samsung’s Vision AI Companion was unveiled as a central hub for all the artificial intelligence (AI) feature for select smart displays. The announcement came on Thursday as an expansion of the Vision AI technology that was first introduced in January. The new central hub allows easy access to the AI features available on the device, as well as a space to have conversations with different AI chatbots.
title: Samsung Vision AI Companion Unveiled at IFA 2025 as a Multi-Agent Central Hub for Smart Displays

description: Warner Bros. Discovery filed a lawsuit against Midjourney for “brazenly dispensing” reproductions of its copyrighted works on Thursday. The media and entertainment company alleged that the AI firm’s image and video generators generate outputs with striking resemblance to its intellectual property, including characters such as Batman, Superman, Scooby Doo, Powerpuff Girls, Rick and Morty, and more.
title: Warner Bros. Discovery Copyright Lawsuit Targets Midjourney for Generating Batman and Superman Images

description: Adobe Premiere, the software giant’s latest video editing app for iPhone devices, was announced on Thursday. It arrives as a more powerful editing tool compared to the existing Premiere Rush, and offers features such as multi-track timelines and dynamic audio waveforms. It is currently available for pre-order on the App Store, and will be officially released on September 30.
title: Adobe Premiere App for iOS Introduced With Desktop-Like Controls, Generative AI Tools

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 is the e-commerce giant's biggest sale event of the year and it is expected to begin on September 23. Ahead of the festive season, deals on smartphones have been teased. Buyers will be able to avail of discounts of up to 40 percent on Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, iPhone 15, OnePlus 13s, Vivo V60, and more.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025: Deals on Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, iPhone 15, OnePlus 13s Teased Ahead of Sale

description: The crypto market stayed cautious on Friday, with Bitcoin holding near $111,500 and Ethereum around $4,300. Strong ETF flows supported Ethereum’s momentum, while Bitcoin remained in consolidation. Altcoins, including Solana, XRP, Dogecoin, and Cardano, showed mixed moves. Analysts highlighted that Federal Reserve policy signals at the September meeting will likely drive the next significant market direction.
title: Bitcoin Holds Steady As Ethereum Gains From Strong ETF Demand

description: Hollow Knight: Silksong, the long-awaited follow-up to 2017 indie hit, Hollow Knight, has shot past 500,000 peak concurrent players on Steam on launch day. The platformer seems to be a colossal hit, with several storefronts facing technical issues as players swarm to download the game.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong's Massive Launch Crashes Steam, PlayStation, Xbox and Nintendo Storefronts

description: Huawei’s FreeBuds 7i use 11mm quad-magnet drivers, a 10-band EQ, and spatial audio with head-tracking to deliver immersive sound. A bone-conduction mic and AI noise cancellation reduce up to 90dB of background noise for clearer calls. The earbuds support Smart Dynamic Noise Cancellation 4.0, Bluetooth 5.4, and multiple codecs, with IP54 resistance. They are claimed to deliver up to eight hours of playback and up to 35 hours with the case without ANC.
title: Huawei FreeBuds 7i Launched With ANC, Spatial Audio Support: Price, Specifications

description: Lava Bold N1 5G has been launched in India as the latest affordable 5G smartphone from the brand. It features a 90Hz HD+ display and runs on Android 15. The phone is powered by a Unisoc T765 processor, with up to 128GB of onboard storage. There is a 13-megapixel AI dual camera system on the back of the Lava Bold N1 5G. The phone packs a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging support.
title: Lava Bold N1 5G Launched in India With 90Hz HD+ Display and 13-Megapixel Rear Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Moto Book 60 Pro has launched in India with a 14-inch 2.8K OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, up to 1,100 nits brightness, and TÜV Rheinland eye protection. It runs on Intel Core Ultra 5 or 7 CPUs with up to 32GB RAM and 1TB SSD storage. Key features include Smart Connect, Dolby Atmos speakers, Windows Hello facial recognition, and MIL-STD-810H durability. The laptop packs a 60Wh battery with 65W fast charging, and supports Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 5.4, and multiple ports.
title: Moto Book 60 Pro Launched in India With Up to Intel Core Ultra 7 CPU, 14-Inch OLED Screen

description: Motorola G06 was recently spotted on a benchmarking website, which revealed its battery capacity. Earlier reports have also suggested the possible price and storage options of the rumoured budget handset. Now, the key specifications and design of the Motorola G06 have leaked online. The price of the phone has also leaked again. The smartphone might sport a teardrop-style notch on the front to house the selfie camera.
title: Motorola G06 to Reportedly Debut With MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme SoC; Check Expected Price, Features

description: OnePlus 15 could launch soon, first in China, and later in India. The supposed OnePlus 13 successor was earlier spotted on a benchmarking website, which revealed that the handset could be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. A recent report also suggested that the rumoured OnePlus phone could be equipped with a proprietary image engine. This has now been confirmed since a company executive has announced the development of the OnePlus DetailMax Engine.
title: OnePlus 15 Confirmed to Feature DetailMax Camera Engine; Tipster Hints at Next-Gen BOE Oriental Display

description: OpenAI announced a Jobs Platform on Thursday, which will be powered by artificial intelligence (AI) technology. The platform will use AI to connect candidates with companies seeking a particular skillset. It is said to be operational by mid-2026. The AI firm is also planning to start offering AI certifications, which will be skill-based and focused on what employers need from their workers.
title: OpenAI to Challenge LinkedIn With New AI-Powered Jobs Platform in 2026

description: Samsung Galaxy S24 5G was unveiled globally, including in India, in January 2024. While the handset is equipped with a Snapdragon chip in select markets, it debuted in India with Samsung’s Exynos 2400 SoC, paired with 8GB of RAM and up to 512GB of onboard storage. Now, the Snapdragon-powered variant of the Samsung Galaxy S24 has been listed on Flipkart, revealing the price of the phone in India, along with its specifications.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 5G With Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Chip Confirmed to Launch in India, Will Go on Sale via Flipkart

description: The iPhone 17 series could outsell the iPhone 16 models, according to predictions by a market intelligence firm. Upgrades, in terms of RAM, storage, and cameras, are expected to stimulate demand, with the iPhone 17 Pro models driving the sales once again. All models apart from the base iPhone 17 may come with 12GB of RAM and 256GB of base storage.
title: iPhone 17 Series Predicted to Outsell iPhone 16 Models With RAM Upgrades, Improved Cameras, and More

description: Japan’s Financial Services Agency has proposed transferring cryptocurrency oversight from the Payment Services Act to the stricter Financial Instruments and Exchange Act. The move aims to address issues such as unregistered operations, scams, disclosure gaps, and security flaws, while improving investor protection. If approved by the Financial System Council and government, this regulatory shift could bring crypto under securities-style rules and set a new benchmark for digital asset regulation in the region.
title: Japan’s Financial Services Agency Mulls Crypto Regulation Under FIEA

description: OpenAI is said to be partnering with Broadcom to create its first artificial intelligence chip, with production expected to begin next year. The company plans to use the new chips internally to support the immense computing power required for its generative AI systems, which produce human-like responses. This move signifies OpenAI’s efforts to manage its own hardware for training and running its AI models.
title: OpenAI Said to Launch Its First AI Chip in 2026 With Broadcom

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series has been spotted in the form of dummy units, showing the Galaxy S26 Pro, Galaxy S26 Edge, and Galaxy S26 Ultra models. The S26 Edge stands out with a new rectangular camera island, while the Pro and Ultra keep a vertical pill-shaped rear camera design. A circular ring on the back suggests Qi2 wireless charging support, a first for Samsung flagships. Notably, dummies are based on leaks and may differ from final models. The Galaxy S26 series is expected in February 2026.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Leaked Dummy Images Hint at iPhone-Inspired Design

description: Apple’s upcoming iOS 26 update will introduce a new Liquid Glass design language for iPhone. As per a feature tracker, WhatsApp is testing the implementation of this feature for its iOS app in beta. It may offer a refreshed visual experience with background layers, buttons, and context menus displaying a depth effect and reacting to their surrounding environment.
title: WhatsApp for iPhone Testing Implementation of Apple’s iOS 26 Liquid Glass in Beta App
